properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_GENDER FROM MEMBER WHERE SECESSION_FL = 'N' ORDER BY MEMBER_NO DESC;
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_NM = ?, MEMBER_GENDER = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PW = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET SECESSION_FL = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ?
